item.title: Cindy Hyde-Smith biograph
item.description: Senator Cindy Hyde-Smith Biograph Cindy Hyde-Smith is an American politician. She is serving as a junior U.S. Senator from Mississippi. She is a member of the Republican Party. She is currently a member of the Mississippi State Senate. Hyde-Smith was Born in Brookhaven, Mississippi. She went to Copiahâ€“Lincoln Community College for an Associate of Arts (AA) degree. She earned the degree of Bachelor of Arts (BA) from the University of Southern Mississippi.
